subject: Noob question re Kernel update and iptables
body:
Hi,Im very new to Linux.I just installed Deb etch.I got an update notice to update my kernelI updated it.Now i get the error:iptables v1.3.6 can't initialize iptables table 'nat'  etc......First of all I do not quite understand everything about Linux having come from a Windows environment.What do I do to solve this problem?I have a dell 5150 laptop and  dell 2300 routerThanks,Frank
